org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.email

Class MimeMailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.email.Mailer
      • org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.email.MimeMailer

  • public class MimeMailer
extends Mailer
    Uses the JavaMail classes to send Mime format email.
    Since:
    Ant 1.5
